agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture & Livestock TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM, Monday, March 18, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Drew Springer HB 32 González, Mary Relating to the licensing and regulation of certain pecan buyers in certain counties; requiring an occupational license; authorizing a fee; creating a criminal offense. HB 70 González, Mary | et al. Relating to a strategic plan goal by the Department of Agriculture to prevent crop diseases in this state. HB 191 Stephenson | et al. Relating to the disposal of pesticides. HB 792 Toth Relating to the use of land in the William Goodrich Jones State Forest. HB 969 Springer Relating to the authority of a political subdivision to regulate the removal by a landowner of noxious or invasive plant species or brush species detrimental to water conservation from the landowner's property. HB 1514 Buckley Relating to the Texas Olive Oil Industry Advisory Board. HB 1563 Nevárez Relating to the licensing and regulation of animal export-import processing facilities; providing penalties; requiring an occupational license; authorizing fees. HB 2053 Murr Relating to organizations providing certain services and liability in connection with prescribed burns. HB 2900 Fierro Relating to the authority of a commodity producers board or a committee to hold meetings by telephone conference. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
